Command.name: G0
Command.title: Rapid move
Command.Description: Move fast to the given position. Movement doesn't need to be a straight line.

Command.name: G1
Command.title: Controlled move
Command.Description: Move in a line to the given position.

Command.name: G28
Command.title: Move to origin
Command.Description: Moves the given axis to its origin. Given values are ignored.

Command.name: G4
Command.title: Dwell
Command.Description: Do nothing for the given time.

Command.name: G20
Command.title: Set units to inches
Command.Description: Units from now on are in inches.

Command.name: G21
Command.title: Set units to millimeter
Command.Description: Units from now on are in millimeter.

Command.name: G90
Command.title: Absolute positioning
Command.Description: Coordinates are absolute to origin.

Command.name: G91
Command.title: Relative positioning
Command.Description: Coordinates are relative to last position.

Command.name: G92
Command.title: Set position
Command.Description: Changes the origin, so that the current position represents the given coordinates.

Command.name: M104
Command.title: Set extruder temperature (fast)
Command.Description: Sets target temperature and returns immediately.

Command.name: M109
Command.title: Set extruder temperature
Command.Description: Sets target temperature and waits until temperature is reached.

Command.name: M105
Command.title: Get temperatures
Command.Description: Returns extruder and heated bed temperature.

Command.name: M106
Command.title: Fan on
Command.Description: Turns the fan on.

Command.name: M107
Command.title: Fan off
Command.Description: Turns the fan off.

Command.name: M108
Command.title: Set extruder speed
Command.Description: Sets extruder motor speed. Deprecated in current firmware.

Command.name: M110
Command.title: Set line number
Command.Description: Used only from host software.

Command.name: M112
Command.title: Emergency stop
Command.Description: Stops doing anything discarding buffered commands.

Command.name: M113
Command.title: Set extruder PWM
Command.Description: Sets extruder power. .5 means 50%.

Command.name: M140
Command.title: Set heated bed temperature (fast)
Command.Description: Sets target temperature and returns immediately.

Command.name: M141
Command.title: Set chamber temperature (fast)
Command.Description: Sets target temperature for the chamber and returns immediately.

Command.name: M116
Command.title: Wait
Command.Description: Wait until target tempertures for extruder and heated bed are reached.

Command.name: M114
Command.title: Get current position
Command.Description: Returns the current position to the host.

Command.name: M115
Command.title: Firmware version and capabilities
Command.Description: Returns the firmware and capabilites.

Command.name: M119
Command.title: Get endstop status
Command.Description: Returns the status of all endstops.

Command.name: M20
Command.title: List SD card
Command.Description: Returns the files stored on SD card.

Command.name: M21
Command.title: Initialize SD card
Command.Description: Initializes SD card.

Command.name: M22
Command.title: Release SD card
Command.Description: Releases SD card.

Command.name: M23
Command.title: Select file on SD card
Command.Description: Selects a file for printing.

Command.name: M24
Command.title: Start/resume SD print
Command.Description: Starts or resumes printing the selected file.

Command.name: M25
Command.title: Pause SD print
Command.Description: Pauses printing from SD card.

Command.name: M26
Command.title: Set SD position
Command.Description: Moves the printing pointer to the given position.

Command.name: M27
Command.title: Report SD print status
Command.Description: Returns status of SD print.

Command.name: M28
Command.title: Begin writing to SD card
Command.Description: The following commands are stored in the given file on SD card.

Command.name: M29
Command.title: Stop writing to SD card
Command.Description: Stops writing to SD card. The following commands are executed.

Command.name: M30
Command.title: Delete file on SD card
Command.Description: Deletes given file from SD card.

Command.name: M82
Command.title: Disable extruder relative mode
Command.Description: Disables relive mode for extruder values.

Command.name: M83
Command.title: Enable extruder relative mode
Command.Description: Enable relative mode for extuder values.

Command.name: M84
Command.title: Disable motors
Command.Description: Disable motors if enabled. May shift extruder position!
